title: Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         In September 1905, Theodore Roosevelt got involved to bring about the very difficult Russo-Japanese Peace Treaty which was initiated at Sagamore Hill and signed at the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard in Kittery, Maine. NPS  There are many ways that you can get involved and help your national parks!   Volunteer  Come on down and lend a hand! NPS Centennial Participate in the celebration of the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. Work With Us Are you interested in a National Park Service career? Donate Help to fund a national park.  Support Your Park Learn about more ways to help sustain your national parks.
